SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT Q.*, I.IMAGE FROM QNA Q, IMAGE I WHERE Q.PRODUCTCODE=I.PRODUCTCODE(+) AND (TYPE = 'title' OR q.productCode IS NULL) AND qnaTitle LIKE '%'||#{schWord}||'%' ORDER BY qnaGroup DESC, qnaStep) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT Q.*, I.IMAGE FROM QNA Q, IMAGE I WHERE Q.PRODUCTCODE=I.PRODUCTCODE(+) AND (TYPE = 'title' OR q.productCode IS NULL) AND qnaContent LIKE '%'||#{schWord}||'%' ORDER BY qnaGroup DESC, qnaStep) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (qnaNum, memberId, productCode, qnaTitle, qnaContent, qnaGroup, qnaStep, qnaIndent, qnaIp) VALUES (QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{productCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, QNA_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0, 0 , #{qnaIp})
mapper.select: SELECT Q.*, I.IMAGE FROM QNA Q, IMAGE I WHERE Q.PRODUCTCODE=I.PRODUCTCODE(+) AND (TYPE = 'title' OR q.productCode IS NULL) AND Q.QNANUM = #{QNANUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET qnaStep = qnaStep + 1 WHERE qnaGroup = #{qnaGroup} AND qnaStep > #{qnaStep}
